title: Clifftop Surf Retreat along Portugal's Silver Coast with Heated Saltwater Pool
description:
Enjoy an unbeatable location in Europe’s surfing ‘mecca’ when you stay at Aethos Ericeira. Part of Aethos' contemporary European brand - which includes designer properties in Milan, Corsica and soon-to-be Mallorca - the hotel boasts an innovative and elegant vibe, perfectly paired with modern furnishings, large windows and designer décor that draws inspiration from the surrounding landscape. With a firm focus on physical and mental well-being, a clifftop location overlooking the Atlantic Ocean and a luxurious heated saltwater pool, Aethos Ericeira's renowned experiential offerings serve all travellers.

The relaxing Ocean Spa promises a range of healing treatments, along with a traditional hamman and limestone hot slab. Meanwhile, ONDA - the hotel's restaurant - delivers locally sourced produce served from the sea right to the table. Combined with wellness offerings designed to heal your mind, body and soul and the world-class waves that crash onto the golden sand, this is the perfect launchpad to explore some of the best and most beautiful beaches in Europe.
